wikipedia_page.main: Ian Rumfitt  is a British philosopher currently serving as a senior research fellow of All Souls College, Oxford.

response: During his career at Oxford, Dummett supervised many philosophers who went on to distinguished careers, including Peter Carruthers, Adrian Moore, Ian Rumfitt, and Crispin Wright.
